meanings.definition: Covered in or resembling a web
meanings.sent1: The old house had the webbiest corners, with dusty cobwebs hanging everywhere.
meanings.sent2: The Halloween decorations were the webbiest I had ever seen, with fake spiderwebs covering the entire porch.
meanings.sent3: The cat's fur looked webbiest after rolling around in the yarn basket.
meanings.sent4: The forest was so dense that it felt like walking through the webbiest maze imaginable.
meanings.sent5: The abandoned room was the webbiest place in the entire building, with silk threads crisscrossing the ceiling.

meanings.sent1: The attic was the webbiest room in the house, filled with spiderwebs in every corner.
meanings.sent2: After neglecting the garden for weeks, it became the webbiest area in the yard, with spiders spinning webs everywhere.
meanings.sent3: The superhero's costume was the webbiest of them all, covered in intricate web patterns.
meanings.sent4: The haunted house was the webbiest place in town, with fake spiderwebs adorning every surface.
meanings.sent5: The cave was the webbiest location the explorers had ever encountered, with spiderwebs stretching from wall to wall.
